cards.name: Static Buildup

cards.name: Defend

Remove this card from your deck.

robotspaceexplorer:Salvage 1.

If the enemy intends to attack, do this again.

Deal 7 (10) damage.

Deal 14 (18) damage.

cards.name: Calculate
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E]  ( [E] ) and robotspaceexplorer:Salvage 1 (2).

cards.name: Discharger

cards.name: Double Block
cards.description:
Gain 9 (13) Block.
Next turn, gain 9 (13) Block.

cards.name: Double Find
cards.description:
Add 2 random cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

cards.name: Dual Core
cards.description: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, gain 3 (5) Vigor and 3 (5) Block.

cards.name: Electropulse
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage to ALL enemies.
Add a Static Buildup to your hand.
Gain robotspaceexplorer:Surge 2 (3).

Gain 14 (19) Block.

cards.name: Exhaust Fan

cards.description: Whenever you apply Weak to an enemy, deal 4 (7) damage to it.

cards.description:

Gain 8 (12) Block.

cards.name: Makeshift Volley
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Deal 5 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

cards.name: MiniBoosters

cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage.
Gain 3 (5) robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare.
Exhaust.

Whenever you play a power, gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Power Glove

Whenever you would deal 5 or less unblocked attack damage,

cards.description:

robotspaceexplorer:Salvage 2.

cards.name: Self-Cleaning
cards.description: Add a Slimed to your hand, then Exhaust all Status cards in your hand. Gain 3 (5) Block and draw a card for each card Exhausted.

Gain 4 (7) Block.
Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Turbo Dodge
cards.description:
Gain 12 (15) Block.
Next turn, gain [E] ( [E]).

cards.description:
Play a random attack from your Exhaust pile X (+1) times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Asteroid
cards.description: Deal 23 (33) damage.

cards.name: Autoloader

~~- Ethereal. -~~
Choose an attack in your hand and remove it from combat. At the start of each turn, play that card.

cards.name: Blast Shield
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to the amount an enemy intends to deal.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blaster
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Charging Laser
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Increase this card's damage by 3 (6) this combat.

cards.name: Comet
cards.description: Gain 3 (5) robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare, then deal damage equal to your robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Drone Swarm
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the end of your turn, deal 2X damage to ALL enemies and gain 2X Block.

cards.name: Exploration
cards.description:
At the end of combat, obtain a random relic.
Remove this card from your deck.

cards.name: Explosion
cards.description: Play a random  (Upgraded ) robotspaceexplorer:Missile card, then play an Aftershock (+) for each Attack Exhausted this combat.

cards.name: High Voltage
cards.description:
Deal 21 (28) damage to ALL enemies.
Add 2 Static Buildups to your hand.

cards.name: Multitool
cards.description:
(Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat.)
At the start of your turn, upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Scanner
cards.description: Whenever you robotspaceexplorer:Salvage, prioritize higher rarity cards.

cards.name: Shock Missile
cards.description:
Deal 7 (8) damage.
Enemy loses 1 (2) Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Trailblazer Form

~~- Ethereal. -~~

cards.name: Wormhole
cards.description: Choose a card in your hand. Permanently remove it and this card from your deck.

relics.name: RoboCore
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 temporary Strength and draw 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: Standard issue power drive that activates when danger is detected.

relics.name: Clockwork Sextant
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, gain 1 Artifact.

relics.name: Foglands Knife
relics.description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 2 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: A small knife used by assassins that appears to have been discarded.

relics.name: Bottled Gravity
relics.description: Choose a card. It costs 1 less [E] in combat.
relics.flavorText: The essence of pure gravity somehow makes the bottle feel lighter.

relics.name: Plasma Hourglass
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Solar Flare.
relics.flavorText: A scientific marvel that swirls with pure plasma.

relics.name: Ring of the Newt
relics.flavorText: An odd fossilized ring that appears to have been discarded.

relics.name: Tough Plating
relics.flavorText: A strong exoskeleton useful for persevering while exploring the depths of space.

relics.name: Reprocessor
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Salvage 1.
relics.flavorText: This advanced device allows spacefarers to reuse valuable resources.

relics.name: Search Specs
relics.description: The first time you Salvage each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: This fashionable accessory is widely used by robotic explorers.

relics.name: TurboCore
relics.description:
Replaces RoboCore.
At the start of each combat, gain 2 temporary Strength, draw 2 additional cards, and gain 1 [E] .
relics.flavorText: Upgraded power drive that activates when danger is detected.

relics.name: Slide Rule
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, play a random Attack from your Exhaust pile.

potions.name: Liquid Fusion
potions.description: Every card in your hand costs 0 until played this turn.

keywords.name: Solar Flare
keywords.description: Deal damage to a random enemy at the end of your turn equal to your Solar Flare.

keywords.name: Missile
keywords.description: An exhausting Attack with "Missile" in its name.

keywords.name: Salvage
keywords.description: Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Surge
keywords.description: At the start of your next turn, remove all Weak on you and gain temporary Strength equal to your Surge.

mods.name: Robot Space Explorer
mods.credits:
Basemod, ModTheSpire
Simplified Chinese: CaptainSnafu
Korean: zerosiki__
mods.description:
A collaboration with my 7-year-old son.

He created about 20 of the card designs and/or names, and about half of the card art.

I built the rest of the character around his work.
